thread.title: At Least Five Dead in Southern California Mudslides After Heavy Rain

author: Jim Carlton
title: At Least Five Dead in Southern California Mudslides After Heavy Rain

organizations.name: least five dead in southern california mudslides after heavy rain los angeles

text:
LOS ANGELESâ€”At least five people were killed and a dozen injured in mudslides triggered by heavy rains in Southern California over night and early Tuesday morning, local officials said.
In Montecito, an upscale community in Santa Barbara, at least five homes were swept away in debris flows that struck in the middle of the night, said Mike Eliason, spokesman for the Santa Barbara County Fire Department.
